long_description: Recommended by veterinarians and trainers, this Premier headcollar offers a humane, positive training approach to manage your dog's behavior. Immediately eliminates pulling on the leash and controls lunging, jumping, begging and barking. Can be used to teach commands such as ''sit'' and ''down'' quickly and effectively using your dog's natural instincts. Eliminates uncomfortable pressure on the throat. Patented fit allows your dog freedom to eat, drink, bark and play. Includes training guide and 30-minute DVD.
short_description: Recommended by veterinarians and trainers, this Premier headcollar offers a humane, positive training approach to manage your dog's behavior.
